TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RandomizedPcaTrainer extends Microsoft.ML.Training.TrainerEstimatorBase`2<class Microsoft.ML.Data.AnomalyPredictionTransformer`1<class Microsoft.ML.Trainers.PCA.PcaModelParameters>, class Microsoft.ML.Trainers.PCA.PcaModelParameters>
Public NotInheritable Class RandomizedPcaTrainer Inherits TrainerEstimatorBase(Of AnomalyPredictionTransformer(Of PcaModelParameters), PcaModelParameters)

Docs.summary: This trainer trains an approximate PCA using Randomized SVD algorithm Reference: https://web.stanford.edu/group/mmds/slides2010/Martinsson.pdf
Docs.remarks: This PCA can be made into Kernel PCA by using Random Fourier Features transform

Docs.param: The name of the feature column.
The name of the weight column.
The number of components in the PCA.
Oversampling parameter for randomized PCA training.
If enabled, data is centered to be zero mean.
The seed for random number generation.
